snippet: Judge Richard Gergel of Federal District Court on Wednesday struck down South Carolina’s same-sex marriage ban as unconstitutional, but gave the state a week to appeal.
abstract: Federal District Court Judge Richard Gergel strikes down South Carolina’s same-sex marriage ban as unconstitutional, but gives state a week to appeal.
lead_paragraph: Judge Richard Gergel of Federal District Court on Wednesday struck down South Carolina’s same-sex marriage ban as unconstitutional, but gave the state a week to appeal.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
